name: Squirt's Necklace
flavorText: An unassuming chunk of stone covered with runes. The name of Kantwirt, the ancient god of thieves, is scratched onto its back.
flavorTextHtml: An unassuming chunk of stone covered with runes. The name of Kantwirt, the ancient god of thieves, is scratched onto its back.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Damage Increased by [51.0 - 100.0]%

secondary.textHtml: +[71 - 80]% Extra Gold from Monsters
While not taking damage, damage dealt is increased by up to 100% and damage taken is increased by up to 50%.
secondary.text: While not taking damage, damage dealt is increased by up to 100% and damage taken is increased by up to 50%.
